info.name: ELIAN ► STYLISH MANAGE STANDALONE
info.description:
Style for the the MANAGER Stylish's enviroment as STANDALONE window and STANDALONE sidebar.

The companion of my style 104407
info.additionalInfo: (All appologies for my english) I hate light UIs. I REALLY HATE THEM. So, this is my Stylish manager inspired in the Firefox's built in Inspector. Since i started, it pass throught different variants, but it hasn't finished. Now, i finnished at all, i uploaded here. Hope you like it. This style will NOT change anything in Style manager from add-ons enviroment. (I think that deserve a new style) Things you should know: • TESTED in FF 28.0 (Locale es) & FF 31 (Locale en) • Stylish version 1.4.3 • OS: Windows XP SP3 (Locale en) • I don't use Chrome. • There are some code that you could make better. (i'm a beginner, i'm try to learn.) • a comment? YES, please. (just not begin. Suggest.) Changelog: • 2014-08-25 Some minor changes. • 2014-08-15 First Release.
